remarks: Eliminate a 3-way disjunction in a deduction.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Apr-2018.)
statement:
mpjao3dan.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
mpjao3dan.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ th ) -> ch ) $.
mpjao3dan.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ta ) -> ch ) $.
mpjao3dan.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ th \/ ta ) ) $.
mpjao3dan $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
